description: Returns a list of cache parameter group descriptions. If a cache parameter group name is specified, the list contains only the descriptions for that group.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: minimum 20; maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: Provides an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.

nested_items.name: CacheParameterGroups
nested_items.description: A list of cache parameter groups. Each element in the list contains detailed information about one cache parameter group.

nested_items.name: CacheParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the cache parameter group.

nested_items.name: CacheParameterGroupFamily
nested_items.description: The name of the cache parameter group family that this cache parameter group is compatible with.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for this cache parameter group.

nested_items.name: IsGlobal
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the parameter group is associated with a Global datastore.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the cache parameter group.
